title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 754.9 - Quality assurance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 754.9 - Quality assurance

State Regulations

In addition to meeting the requirements set forth in
section
751.8
of this Title, the operator
shall ensure that there is a review of all mother and/or newborn hospital
transfers, with reasons for such transfers documented. Findings from these
reviews shall be used in the development and revision of policies and in the
consideration of renewing or granting staff privileges. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
754.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
